body_html:
Thanks for pointing this out. As you found out, this was fixed in #7080 and will be reflected in the next release (you can preview the docs for 1.1 that show this fix at https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.1/api_docs/cc/class/tensorflow/ops/space-to-batch-n-d)

Closing this out, since this has been fixed - just not reflected to the website yet, which will be soon.

body:
Thanks for pointing this out. As you found out, this was fixed in #7080 and will be reflected in the next release (you can preview the docs for 1.1 that show this fix at https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.1/api_docs/cc/class/tensorflow/ops/space-to-batch-n-d)

Closing this out, since this has been fixed - just not reflected to the website yet, which will be soon.
